dcterms:creator: Markus Nußbaum-Thom
Simon Wiesler
Martin Sundermeyer

dcterms:description: The Quaero task involves a subset of 50 hours from the Quaero Broadcast Conversational English Speech database, used for automatic speech recognition experiments.
dcterms:title: Quaero

dcterms:creator: Zoltán Tüske
Pavel Golik
Ralf Schlüter
Hermann Ney
dcterms:description: The Switchboard-1 Release 2 corpus is used for training and evaluation in speech recognition tasks, providing a large dataset of conversational speech.
dcterms:title: Switchboard-1 Release 2 (LDC97S62)

dcterms:creator: Zoltán Tüske
Pavel Golik
Ralf Schlüter
Hermann Ney
dcterms:description: The Hub5’00 evaluation data is used for testing speech recognition systems, providing a benchmark for performance evaluation.
dcterms:title: Hub5’00

dcterms:creator: Pavel Golik
Zoltán Tüske
Ralf Schlüter
Hermann Ney
dcterms:description: The Babel Javanese full language pack is used for keyword search tasks in very low-resource languages, providing a dataset for multilingual feature extraction.
dcterms:title: Babel Javanese full language pack (IARPA-babel402b-v1.0b)
